subject: Soccer
Multiple Sclerosis
lead_paragraph: Demitrius Omphroy was diagnosed with multiple sclerosis in 2010, but that hasn’t stopped him from playing soccer, as he tries to break the starting lineup of Toronto F.C.
snippet: Demitrius Omphroy was diagnosed with multiple sclerosis in 2010, but that hasn’t stopped him from playing soccer, as he tries to break the starting lineup of Toronto F.C.
